name: Ext_R4_MedicinalProductContraindication
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.MedicinalProductContraindication for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductContraindication from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductContraindication|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: MedicinalProductContraindication
element.definition: The clinical particulars - indications, contraindications etc. of a medicinal product, including for regulatory purposes.
